name: Alter Size
effect: The mage can alter an object's Size, making it larger or smaller. One point of Size can be altered per success, within the limits of the caster's Matter dots.

rotes.roteDescription: By expanding or compressing the amount of space between the atoms in an object, a Free Council mage can increase or decrease the subject's size without altering any of its material qualities. Adamantine Arrow mages sometimes use this rote to hide secret weapons or other supplies on their persons.
